#include<iostream>
#include<unistd.h>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
void act();
long long real[1000000];
int real_prime[1000000]={0};
int ptr=0;
long long prime[200];
int p[1100]={0};
int k=0;
void seive()
{
	p[0]=1;
	p[1]=1;
	for(int i=2;i<=1000;i++)
	{
		if(p[i]==0)
		{
			prime[k++]=i;
			for(int j=(i*i),l=0;j<=1000;j=(i*i)+(l*i)){
				p[j]=1;++l;}
		}
	}
	act();
}
void act()
{
	real_prime[0]=1;
	real_prime[1]=1;
	for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
	{
		for(int j=prime[i]*prime[i],l=0; j<=1000000; j=(prime[i]*prime[i])+(l*prime[i]))
		{
			real_prime[j]=1;
			++l;
		}
	}
	long long s;
	for(long long  i=0;i<1000000;i++)
		if(real_prime[i]==0)
		{//cout<<"s "<<i*i<<endl;
			s=i*i;
			real[ptr++]=s;
		}
}

int binsearch(long long arr[],int low,int high,long long  x)
{
	int mid;
	while(low<=high)
	{
		mid=(low+high)/2;
		if(arr[mid]==x)
			return 1;
		else if(x>arr[mid])
			low=mid+1;
		else 
			high=mid-1;
	}
	return 0;
}

int main()
{
seive();
//for (int i=0;i<ptr;i++)
//cout<<real[i]<<endl;
//cout<<real[1000]<<endl<<"asa"<<endl;
//cout<<real[0]<<endl<<"asa"<<endl;
int t;
long long n;
///cout<<ptr<<endl;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{	
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	if(binsearch(real,0,ptr+1,n))
		printf("YES\n");
	else 
		printf("NO\n");
}
return 0;
}
